General.Name: Avertronics
General.Description: Avertronics Inc. engages in the design and manufacture of connectors and wire-harnesses in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides automotive cables for electric moped, motorbike tricycle, yacht, and other electric vehicles. It offers ODM/OBM waterproof connectors, sports equipment, UPS power cord set, TPS power cord set, and dust free PE bags. Avertronics Inc. was founded in 1986 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4.Name: Kun Yao  Zheng
4.Title: Deputy Chief of Innovation and Devel. Center
